field.template: #if (kendo.toString(grant_all) == "" || kendo.toString(grant_all) == "false") {# <input type = "checkbox" data-widget-group = "grid" data-widget-type = "w_checkbox" data-widget-role = "grant_all_access" /> #} else {# <input type = "checkbox" data-widget-group = "grid" data-widget-type = "w_checkbox" data-widget-role = "grant_all_access" checked /> #} #
